name: Fantasy Mission
description:
Fantasy Mission

Fantasy Mission is a 2D action game that is currently in development.

You can choose between two heroes to complete risky missions in which you will face orcs, trolls, warlocks and other dangers.

Project

This project is for my Game Develop degree. Tell me if you would like to play the full game. Thanks for feedback.

Controls

Move: cursors

Attack: Space

Evade: V

Use item: Z

Pause: Esc

Credits

Developer: Ivan Moraleja

Art: craftpix.net

Sound: freesound.org

Music:
Folk Round, by Kevin MacLeod
Subtle Betrayal, by SYBS
The Land of the Wizard, by Per Kiilstofte
